item.description:
Angels on Assignment  is a monthly group that meets to heal ones mind, body, and spirit by using a Chakra light during meditation. By using this Chakra light, you become your own healing angel on assignment.

Each month we will focus on one of the essential Chakra rays: Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, Violet, Indigo, and Crystal White.  We will practice various meditation processes with each ray. As a group, we will anchor the healing light frequencies of the Chakras for our own personal well being, for well being of others, and for the healing of our planet. As taught, these practices offer keys and codes of meditative consciousness to strengthen our body, mind, and soul connection. We will discuss each key and code so that you can better  understand the Chakra path of light energy that can be and has been opened for you.  Through understanding, transformations can occur.
item.how_to_find_us: The meditation is held on the second floor of the gallery and is accessible via stairs only
item.name: Angel Chakra Meditation Group
